effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 673,487 damage to your primary target and 127,247 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

name: Geargrinder's Spare Keys

spells.description: Use: Launch a Geargrinder trike to its final blaze of glory, exploding upon impacting the first enemy in its path to deal 2.1 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: I'm gonna step on the gas!

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,731 to 9,450 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 286 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
